definition: needlework created by interlacing yarn in a series of connected loops using straight eyeless needles or by machine, to gather something into small wrinkles or folds
details:
noun
- needlework created by interlacing yarn in a series of connected loops using straight eyeless needles or by machine
= synonyms: knitting
- a basic knitting stitch
= synonyms: plain
- a fabric made by knitting
verb
- to gather something into small wrinkles or folds
= synonyms: cockle
- make (textiles) by knitting
= example: make (textiles) by knitting
- tie or link together
= synonyms: entwine
